metadata.title: 5126-1 -- Bind vulnerability
metadata.description: Kishore Kumar Kothapalli discovered that Bind incorrectly handled the lame cache when processing responses. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Bind to consume resources, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5126-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dnsutils - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1 bind9-libs - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1 bind9utils - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1 bind9-dev - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1 bind9-doc - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1 bind9-utils - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1 bind9 - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1 bind9-dnsutils - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1 bind9-host - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
